attributes.additional_details: The industry is losing alot of money and due to the u turn last week alot of venues had ordered perishable food that will now go to waste. This is on top of the money they are already down to covid. Why make the wedding industry suffer more when it is possible to hold covid safe reception meals?
attributes.background: Allow wedding receptions from 15th August 2020. Small wedding receptions can be held easily with covid rules. People are not going to want family members to get I'll and will be much safer than pubs. Venues can easily apply the 2 household table rule like restaurants.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/329363
